description: Spring and summer – when the mountains open up and the trails clear – present mild, but still shifting, conditions. Providing measured warmth, the versatile Kyanite LT Jacket performs as midlayer or standalone and delivers measured warmth across a range of activities. Light, breathable and soft, the Torrent™ fleece stretches for ergonomic freedom and easy layering under a shell. The fit is trim and streamlined, and the minimalist design is clean and focused.
name: Arcteryx Kyanite LT Jacket - Mens
